Connection(DatabaseManager, ConnectionLevel, Database) - Constructor for class com.sendev.databasemanager.Connection
Creates a database connection for the DBM connection container, allowing the container to sort and managed the connection from it's connection level.
connection - Variable in class com.sendev.databasemanager.contracts.Database
Represents our current database connection, this is used to send queries to the database, as well as fetch, and persist data.
